name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Paul BALLOD, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN, and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Paul BALLOD, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 745
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Paul BALLOD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 28, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Alan Sacks, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN, and WILKINSON, JJ.
